channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed Chair Powell says he will not resign if asked by President-elect Trump
Monkeys escape medical research lab for the fourth time—over 40 are currently on the loose
item.description: It marks the fourth time since 2014 that primates have escaped the facility. Dozens escaped most recently in 2018.

item.title: Fed cuts benchmark interest rate by quarter-point
Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan declines keeping a lid on intraday Dow advance
In the wake of an election that divided the workplace, CEOs must inspire unity
item.description: CEOs are overwhelmingly of the unwavering belief that a wide range of life experiences and perspectives among their employees is better for business.

item.title: Trump got women, Hispanic and Black voters to turn their backs on the Democratic party
item.description: Trump benefitted from narrow gains among both men and women, with Harris modestly underperforming compared with Biden in 2020.

item.title: Fed rate cuts today and next month may already be locked in — live coverage
Fed sees more weakness in U.S. jobs market as it cuts rates by quarter-point
Wall Street is foaming at the mouth with all the possible mergers and acquisitions that may now go through with Trump as president
item.description: Goldman Sachs expects a 20% increase in M&A activity next year.

item.title: I went to Harris’s concession speech—here’s what I heard from Black women
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris chose her alma mater Howard University as the site for her speech.
